Version Bump : Major._readme: will update the 'patch' section of the semantic version (x.0.0)

Version Bump : Minor._readme: will update the 'patch' section of the semantic version (0.x.0)

Version Bump : Patch._readme: will update the 'patch' section of the semantic version (0.0.x)

Version Bump : Preview._readme: will update the 'preview' section of the semantic version (0.0.0-preview.x)

Version Bump : Manual._readme: useful for setting a preview for an upcoming version. Will ask for a prompt of the new version string
